approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

allowance.description: Returns the amount that the spender is still allowed to withdraw from the owner’s account.

balanceOf.description: Returns the token balance of a specific address.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used to define the token.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the spender’s allowance by the specified amount.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the spender’s allowance by the specified amount.

mainchainGateway.description: Returns the address of the mainchain gateway.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens in circulation.

Approval.description: Emitted when an approval is made for a spender to withdraw tokens.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another.
